title: Asana Work Management - Features, Uses & Product • Asana
content: The only work management platform built for scale With Asana, you can set company-wide goals, manage strategic plans,  and get work done on a single platform. 85% of Fortune 100 companies use Asana⁴ Automate workflows across departments Create more efficient processes so you can seamlessly manage projects across departments and get more done in less time. Track work from start to finish, so every team stays in sync and on schedule to hit their goals. Connect work to company-wide goals See how each project and portfolio ladders up to company objectives and keep everyone focused on the work that matters. Get the visibility you need to plan accurate timelines, adjust workloads, and stay on track to achieve your objectives. Centrally manage users with security you can trust Create and manage teams and team settings to ensure that everyone has access to the right information. More than 100,000 of the world's most innovative enterprises trust Asana to keep their data safe. Where work connects Drive clarity and accountability Connect work to company-wide goals to keep everyone focused on the work that matters and make better decisions faster with real-time data. Maximize impact Increase efficiency across departments and tools on a single platform and automate workflows to get more done in less time. Scale with confidence Connect teams and tools across your organization with enterprise-grade security, governance, and control. AI is no longer just a tool—it’s a teammate Discover AI teammates that can give insights, take action, and level up goals across your entire Asana experience. Recognized as a leader by top analyst firms A Leader in The Forrester Wave: Collaborative Work Management Tools 2025 Report A leader in Work Management and OKR Software with more than 12,000 user reviews Frequently asked questions Asana is a leader in collaborative project management software for teams, no matter their size or locational distribution. Asana helps you, your teams, and your stakeholders collaborate faster and smoother to achieve business objectives. Asana offers a free trial for its Starter and Advanced plans. Visit asana.com/pricing for more information. Access in Asana may vary based on the plan you choose. For Enterprise plans, teams have access to all of Asana’s paid features. For Starter and Advanced plans, feature access may vary. Visit asana.com/pricing for more information. Asana is happy to offer eligible nonprofits a discount on our Starter or Advanced annual plan. For Enterprise plans, Asana is happy to discuss options that meet the needs of your business. Click “get started” on this page to be put in touch with a representative that can help with pricing solutions for Enterprise plans. Protecting the data you trust to Asana is our first priority. Asana uses physical, procedural, and technical safeguards to preserve the integrity and security of your information. We regularly back up your data to prevent data loss and aid in recovery. Additionally, we host data in secure SSAE 16 / SOC2 certified data centers, implement firewalls and access restrictions on our servers to better protect your information, and work with third party security researchers to ensure our practices are secure. Learn more. Asana is accessible via desktop app, web browser, and mobile app (available for both Android and iOS users). Yes, you can. Many customers enjoy using Asana to organize and streamline their personal tasks. Asana integrates with over 200 tools and counting. Visit asana.com/integrations for more information. Transform the way you work with Asana 4. Accurate as of December 2023, includes free and paid users.
description: What is Asana? Read about features, how to use it, and signing up for an account. Asana has business features for your projects, workflows, goals, and team!
